hi Solomon,

the getClassCatalog() problem was encountered in HER-1627 due
to misconfiguration in H1, but it required a patch in H3 due
to a change in the PersistProcessor implementation from H1
to H3.

PersistLogProcessor is still recommended for H1 dedupe config
as described here:

Deduping (Duplication Reduction)
https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/x/aoFz

hope that helps.

/steve@...



On 5/18/10 9:43 AM, Solomon Gibbs wrote:
>
>
> HI,
>
> I'm trying to get deduplication working in Heritrix 1.14.4. It seems
> like there is a problem using BDB as the persistent history store. I'm
> running into the problem mentioned in
> https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1627
> <https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1627>
> where getClassCatalog tries to open the read-only history DB with write
> access.
>
> Based on the comments in Jira, it looks like this was never opened as a
> distinct bug from HER-1627 and only fixed as a side-issue in the H3 tree.
>
> Is PersistLogProcessor the recommended way to do deduplication with H1?
> Or have I just misconfigured the PersistStoreProcessor somehow?
>
>
> Thanks,
>
> - Solomon
